desc: Graceful Art Designs sells handmade authentic African waist beads and jewelry. Our goal is to share our love of traditional Ghanaian beads and accessories to women all over the world. Our waist beads are handmade by Ghanaian's in Ghana. Custom waist beads and bracelets and necklaces are handmade in the USA.

layout.text: GRACEFUL ART DESIGNS LC WAS STARTED BY A YOUNG WOMAN WHO WAS BORN IN GHANA AND NOW LIVES IN THE UNITED STATES. IT BEGAN AS A SMALL BUSINESS WITH ALL ITEMS MADE BY US. WE NOW SELL GHANAIAN ACCESSORIES MADE BY VARIOUS ARTISANS IN GHANA.
